articles.description: Eindhoven is packed with carnival-goers but on Tuesday it was Arsenal enjoying their own party, setting a Champions League record in the process.
articles.title: PSV 1-7 Arsenal: Record-breaking Gunners enjoy carnival season in Eindhoven

articles.description: Brahim Diaz's brilliant winner gave Real Madrid a slender advantage after the first leg of their Champions League last-16 tie against rivals Atletico Madrid.
articles.title: Real Madrid 2-1 Atletico Madrid - Brahim Diaz nets winner in derby meeting

articles.description: From the "biggest mistake" to an "incredible" performance against Club Brugge - Tyrone Mings helps Aston Villa take a huge step towards the Champions League quarter-finals.
articles.title: Tyrone Mings: Aston Villa defender's Champions League redemption against Club Brugge

articles.description: Australia captain Steve Smith lauds Virat Kohli as "arguably the best chaser" in history but what do the statistics say and what makes the India great so good?
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025: India's Virat Kohli 'best ODI chaser', says Australia's Steve Smith

articles.description: Emma Raducanu says her recent stalking ordeal "could have been dealt with better", but believes lessons have already been learnt.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu says Dubai stalking incident 'could have been dealt with better'

articles.description: Dallas Mavericks guard Kyrie Irving will miss the rest of the season after tearing the anterior cruciate ligament in his left knee.
articles.title: Kyrie Irving injury: Dallas Mavericks star ruled out rest of season with ACL injury

articles.description: Arne Slot told referee Michael Oliver he would blame him if Liverpool fail to win the Premier League.
articles.title: Arne Slot: Liverpool boss told referee Michael Oliver he would 'blame him' if Reds don't win title

articles.description: Hakon Haraldsson scores the equaliser as Lille fight back to earn a draw at Borussia Dortmund in the first leg of their Champions League last-16 tie.
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund 1-1 Lille: Hakon Haraldsson goal earns Lille first-leg draw

articles.description: Jamie George says he considered ending his England career because of the shock and pain of losing the captaincy before the start of the Six Nations.
articles.title: Jamie George on pain of losing captaincy before Six Nations

articles.description: Newcastle would be "crazy" to to sell top players like striker Alexander Isak after posting a significant reduction in losses in their 2023-24 accounts, according to chief executive Darren Eales.
articles.title: Newcastle United: Club would be 'crazy' to sell Alexander Isak
